column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Getting in the place wasn't a hassle. We were sitting down in 5 mins. The server was very courteous and helpful with the menu. Â Don't be surprised by the wait
column2: it's worth it! Chicago style is the way to go. It could've tasted as fantastic as any great pizzeria in the country. What makes it fabulous is the superb butter crust!
